string.value: Juliet was able to make the clothes. It was very well-made, actually. She must be good with her hands. There's one slight problem, though... I wonder if she'll really give it to Romeo, because it is DEFINITELY FOR WOMEN!! I knew something wasn't right. Despite the concerns, Juliet asked me to give this "dress" to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo seemed very happy to receive the clothes that Juliet made for him. Seriously, is he going to wear that dress with the pink ribbon on? Alchemists are really strange.. that's for sure.
Phew... hey there, traveler! Look at this! I finally finished making the clothes for Romeo! Isn't it beautiful?? \r\n#b#L0# (It's pretty, but...)#l

Sirin's patterns had all the instructions meticulously written, so it wasn't hard for me to make it. I really think it's unique-looking, and beautiful to look at. Hehehe...\r\n#b#L0# (I know, but...)#l
I imagined Romeo wearing this as I made this, and it was just a breeze! I thought alchemy was fun, but I had no idea tailoring would be just as fun! \r\n#b#L0#(Romeo wearing women's clothes??!)#l

Now all I need to do is give this to Romeo. I wonder how Romeo will react when he receives this. He may be surprised, but he'll be very happy to receive this, don't you think so? I can't wait...\r\n#b#L0# (Are you really going to dress him up with female clothes?)#l
Hah, but it's still hard to give this to Romeo, looking at him right in the eyes. It's so... embarrassing, you know. If it's alright with you... can you give this to Romeo for me?
Wow! I knew you would Say yes! Please take these clothes and give them to #bRomeo#k. Please make sure to tell him Juliet make these... thanks!
You must be busy with something. If you ever change your mind, please talk to me.
Ahhhh... hello traveler! I gave Juliet the flower like you told me to, and Juliet seemed so happy, all thanks to you. I want to thank you and... wait, what do you have there?

This... is made by Juliet? Juliet made this for me...? I can't believe this... I am in shock... this is amazing! I don't know what to say... except this is amazing. And thank you, traveler, for helping us out.
Wait, what am I doing? I should be trying on this dress. Hopefully Juliet will love it when I pull this towards Sam.
Have you not gone to see#bRomeo#k yet? Please make your way there a bit faster, traveler... I can't wait to see how he reacts to this!
Oh, hello traveler! Do you have something to take care of here? If you need any help, please feel free to let me know!

How can you do that...! I worked so hard on those clothes, and for you to lose it... that's terrible. Luckily, I attached a #rtracer marble#k on the dress, so I can keep track of it. I'll give you the dress once more, so please, please don't lose it as you make your way to Romeo.
